title: Wifi, Wifi Everywhere!
text: resin-wifi-connect application brings up an access point with a web interface where you can configure the new wifi credentials.

title: Enerbrain
text: Enerbrain believes that buildings are central to sustainable development and is on a mission to make them smarter, healthier and more energy efficient.

title: Smart Plants
text: Smart Plants is enabling remote and autonomous management of critical industrial infrastructure.

title: Open Source Guide #1: Documentation and JSDoc
